1   package net.sf.oval.test.constraints;
2   
3   import net.sf.oval.constraint.EmailCheck;
4   
5   public class EmailTest extends AbstractContraintsTest
6   {
7   	public void testEmail()
8   	{
9   		final EmailCheck check = new EmailCheck();
10  		super.testCheck(check);
11  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, null, null, null));
12  
13  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "testjee@yahoo.com", null, null));
14  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee@yahoo.co", null, null));
15  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test.jee@yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
16  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test.jee@yahoo.co.biz", null, null));
17  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee@yahoo.com", null, null));
18  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee@yahoo.net", null, null));
19  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "user@subname1.subname2.subname3.domainname.co.uk", null, null));
20  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test.j'ee@yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
21  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test.j'e.e'@yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
22  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "testj'ee@yahoo.com", null, null));
23  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test&jee@yahoo.com", null, null));
24  		assertTrue(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_j.s.@yahoo.com", null, null));
25  
26  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee#marry@yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
27  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee@ yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
28  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee  @yahoo.co.uk", null, null));
29  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_j ee  @yah oo.co.uk", null, null));
30  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee  @yah oo.co.uk", null, null));
31  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "test_jee @ yahoo.com", null, null));
32  		assertFalse(check.isSatisfied(null, "user@subname1.subname2.subname3.domainn#ame.co.uk", null, null));
33  	}
34  }
This page was automatically generated by Maven
